Docs.summary: Asynchronously adds an entry to the directory.
Docs.param: LDAPEntry object specifying the distinguished name and attributes of the new entry.
Handler for messages returned from a server in response to this request. If it is null, a queue object is created internally.

Handler for messages returned from a server in response to this request. If it is null, a queue object is created internally.
